participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Creative and easygoing, Ethan enjoys exploring new recipes and finding inspiration in music.
participant_1.background: I like to walk around and listen to music to clear my head. I am a classically trained chef. I have a girlfriend of 7 years. I can type 140 words per minute. I check the Steelers' score from the previous night before I start my day.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Lily is friendly and nurturing, with a passion for family and creative pursuits like baking.
participant_2.background: My music collection is the most valuable thing to me because it represents my personality and interests. I am the youngest of 4 children. I love spending time with my family and bingeing on Netflix. My morning routine begins with checking on my animals and tending to the crops. I spent most of my summer last year playing hockey.

content.text: Hi, what's your favorite way to clear your head?
I love listening to music and walking around. It really helps me relax and get into a better headspace.
That's great! I do the same thing. I'm a classically trained chef, so I love listening to music while I cook. It helps me get in the zone.
That's awesome! I love cooking too, but I'm not much of a chef. I'm more of a baker.
Baking is great! I love making bread. It's so satisfying to see your hard work come together.
I know, right? It's the best feeling.
So, what's your favorite thing to bake?
I love making chocolate chip cookies. They're so easy to make and they always turn out delicious.
I love chocolate chip cookies too! They're my favorite.
Mine too! We should bake some together sometime.
That would be fun! I'll bring the flour.
And I'll bring the chocolate chips
